parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield wiper motor can cause the wipers to malfunction, leading to reduced visibility during rainy or snowy conditions, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The windshield wipers work intermittently
the windshield wipers stop working while in use
the windshield wipers turn off when they are needed
the windshield wipers do not work at all.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine cooling fan can cause the engine to overheat, leading to engine damage, stalling, or even complete failure, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The fan splits or breaks apart
the fan falls off the engine
the fan clutch fails
the engine overheats
the vehicle stalls or loses power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine air intake system can cause the engine to ingest water, leading to hydraulic lock-up of the pistons, engine damage, or complete failure, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The engine ingests water through the air intake system
the engine stalls or loses power
the vehicle is unable to operate in heavy rain or wet conditions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause the steering wheel to lock up, making it difficult or impossible to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The steering wheel locks up for no reason
the vehicle is difficult to steer
the steering system fails to respond to driver input.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Pedal Pulsation and Loss of Braking
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The brake pedal pulsation and loss of braking can cause the vehicle to temporarily lose braking ability, leading to accidents or near-misses, and potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brake pedal pulsates or moves back and forth when pressed
the vehicle temporarily loses braking ability
a loud grinding sound is heard when the brake pedal is pressed
the brake pedal goes to the floor with no braking response.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The complete failure of the brakes can cause the vehicle to lose all braking ability, leading to accidents or near-misses, and potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brake pedal goes to the floor with no braking response
the vehicle is unable to stop
the brakes fail to engage
the emergency brake is unable to stop the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause the vehicle to lose braking ability, leading to accidents or near-misses, and potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brake pedal pulsates or moves back and forth when pressed
the vehicle temporarily loses braking ability
a loud grinding sound is heard when the brake pedal is pressed
the brake pedal goes to the floor with no braking response
the vehicle is unable to stop.
